report.name: 分税种报表_链接子报表

paraPro.name: kjmc

report.title: @nian@年@yue@月分税种@kjmc@_链接子报表

rptData.sql: select {XM} tmpmc,xm,dndy,dnlj,sndy,snlj,ljzj,zf,bz from ( select '1.7' xh,v03 xm,n01 dndy,n02 dnlj,n03 sndy,n04 snlj,n05 ljzj,n06 zf,n07 bz from bb_data where bb_id='BB_SZ' and ny={ZWRQ} and V08={SRKJ} and v01 in ('1.7.1.1','1.7.1.2','1.7.1.3','1.7.1.4','1.7.1.5','1.7.1.6','1.7.1.7','1.7.1.8','1.7.1.9','1.7.2.0','1.7.2.1','1.7.2.2') union all select '1.7' xh,'合计' xm,n01 dndy,n02 dnlj,n03 sndy,n04 snlj,n05 ljzj,n06 zf,n07 bz from bb_data where bb_id='BB_SZ' and ny={ZWRQ} and V08={SRKJ} and v01='1.7' union all select '1.8' xh,v03 xm,n01 dndy,n02 dnlj,n03 sndy,n04 snlj,n05 ljzj,n06 zf,n07 bz from bb_data where bb_id='BB_SZ' and ny={ZWRQ} and V08={SRKJ} and v01 in ('1.8.1','1.8.2') union all select '1.8' xh,'合计' xm,n01 dndy,n02 dnlj,n03 sndy,n04 snlj,n05 ljzj,n06 zf,n07 bz from bb_data where bb_id='BB_SZ' and ny={ZWRQ} and V08={SRKJ} and v01='1.8' union all select '1.9' xh,v03 xm,n01 dndy,n02 dnlj,n03 sndy,n04 snlj,n05 ljzj,n06 zf,n07 bz from bb_data where bb_id='BB_SZ' and ny={ZWRQ} and V08={SRKJ} and v01 in ('1.9.1','1.9.2','1.9.3','1.9.4','1.9.5','1.9.6','1.9.7') union all select '1.9' xh,'合计' xm,n01 dndy,n02 dnlj,n03 sndy,n04 snlj,n05 ljzj,n06 zf,n07 bz from bb_data where bb_id='BB_SZ' and ny={ZWRQ} and V08={SRKJ} and v01='1.9' union all select v01 xh,v03 xm,n01 dndy,n02 dnlj,n03 sndy,n04 snlj,n05 ljzj,n06 zf,n07 bz from bb_data where bb_id='BB_SZ' and ny={ZWRQ} and V08={SRKJ} and v01 in ('1.1','1.2','1.3','1.4','1.5','1.6','2.0') ) where xh={SZ}
